taskbody.context: You can skip an open activity based on your requirements.

info.p: You can select the Skip option for an activity only when the activity is yet to be performed.

step.cmd: For the activity you want to skip, select Skip.

stepresult.p: The window for entering skip comments appears. If the activity is overdue and the option to enter overdue comments for an activity is required, the window for entering overdue comments appears. In the window for entering overdue comments, you must enter your comment about the overdue activity in the ADD OVERDUE COMMENT box, and then select Save. The window for entering for skip comments then appears.

step.cmd: In the ADD SKIP COMMENT box, enter your comment about skipping the activity.
step.stepresult: An informational message stating that the comment was successfully added appears in the Open page.You can delete a skip comment added to a skipped activity in the Completed page. For more information, refer to the topic.

taskbody.result: The activity is skipped and no longer appears in the Open page. You can view the activity in the Completed page.
